sixfivezerotwo.multiLineComment: ; ___ _ __ ___ __ ___ ; / __|_ _ __ _| |_____ / /| __|/ \_ ) ; \__ \ ' \/ _` | / / -_) _ \__ \ () / / ; |___/_||_\__,_|_\_\___\___/___/\__/___| ; Change direction: W A S D ; $00-01 => screen location of apple ; $10-11 => screen location of snake head ; $12-?? => snake body (in byte pairs) ; $02 => direction (1 => up, 2 => right, 4 => down, 8 => left) ; $03 => snake length
